Implication: "Two women are in shorts and protective equipment."
Referring expressions: Two women  Two women, shorts, protective equipment.
Formula: (exists a (IsNear(a,a)) & (forall d ( IsInShorts(d) ->  IsNear(d,d))) & (forall e ( IsNear(e,e) ->   IsProtectivelyEquipped(e)))) -> (exists a (IsInShorts(a) and IsProtectivelyEquipped(a)))
